UniprotID	Q9P2T1
Accession	Q9P2T1;D3DS66;Q567T0;Q6IAJ8;Q86T14
EntryName	GMPR2_HUMAN
ProteinName	GMP reductase 2 (GMPR 2) (EC 1.7.1.7) (Guanosine 5'-monophosphate oxidoreductase 2) (Guanosine monophosphate reductase 2)
GeneName	GMPR2
Length	348
Function	Catalyzes the irreversible NADPH-dependent deamination of GMP to IMP. It functions in the conversion of nucleobase, nucleoside and nucleotide derivatives of G to A nucleotides, and in maintaining the intracellular balance of A and G nucleotides (PubMed:12009299, PubMed:12669231, PubMed:16359702, PubMed:22037469). Plays a role in modulating cellular differentiation (PubMed:12669231).
Subcellular Location	
Disorder	0.3631,0.2002,0.2399,0.2849,0.2328,0.1702,0.1229,0.1501,0.2094,0.2292,0.2575,0.2884,0.2609,0.1823,0.2575,0.2503,0.2364,0.2258,0.3019,0.2364,0.3249,0.2364,0.3494,0.3529,0.3426,0.2918,0.3631,0.3249,0.3249,0.3053,0.3053,0.2988,0.3117,0.3087,0.2988,0.2988,0.3053,0.2364,0.2715,0.1759,0.1643,0.1349,0.1791,0.1914,0.1583,0.1702,0.2783,0.2164,0.3321,0.3321,0.2064,0.2258,0.1969,0.1643,0.1611,0.1823,0.1229,0.0765,0.1115,0.0454,0.0749,0.0749,0.0433,0.0543,0.0405,0.0327,0.0313,0.0300,0.0454,0.0253,0.0248,0.0300,0.0188,0.0240,0.0165,0.0174,0.0275,0.0227,0.0306,0.0313,0.0690,0.0749,0.1424,0.2541,0.1731,0.1298,0.2002,0.2002,0.1373,0.1162,0.1611,0.1611,0.2328,0.2988,0.2951,0.3910,0.3774,0.3599,0.4831,0.3983,0.4149,0.4149,0.3182,0.3087,0.3053,0.3053,0.3053,0.3053,0.2752,0.2752,0.3321,0.3667,0.3053,0.3053,0.2164,0.1424,0.0780,0.0483,0.0531,0.0327,0.0543,0.0518,0.0494,0.0454,0.0398,0.0424,0.0734,0.0631,0.0372,0.0518,0.0433,0.0240,0.0223,0.0356,0.0240,0.0433,0.0704,0.1323,0.1137,0.1251,0.1823,0.2129,0.2094,0.1399,0.1881,0.1643,0.1449,0.1476,0.1823,0.1823,0.1702,0.2715,0.3566,0.3249,0.2470,0.3356,0.3494,0.2752,0.1914,0.2193,0.1881,0.1791,0.1501,0.1583,0.1583,0.1251,0.1449,0.1048,0.0967,0.0888,0.1275,0.1449,0.1449,0.1298,0.1115,0.0909,0.0835,0.0765,0.1275,0.1881,0.2609,0.2680,0.2680,0.2364,0.2193,0.2094,0.3182,0.3356,0.3215,0.3249,0.3740,0.3149,0.2470,0.2715,0.1881,0.2164,0.3249,0.2884,0.2503,0.2470,0.2503,0.1791,0.1702,0.1702,0.2328,0.1611,0.1731,0.1476,0.1476,0.2094,0.2064,0.1528,0.2064,0.1554,0.1643,0.2399,0.2817,0.2094,0.2094,0.2364,0.2034,0.1251,0.1852,0.1643,0.1643,0.1349,0.2064,0.1881,0.1399,0.1092,0.0704,0.0719,0.1229,0.0985,0.1115,0.0765,0.0780,0.0765,0.1092,0.1449,0.1476,0.1702,0.2575,0.2817,0.2399,0.1702,0.2164,0.2164,0.3286,0.3807,0.4119,0.4831,0.3948,0.3910,0.3529,0.3321,0.2752,0.2715,0.2292,0.2292,0.2094,0.2258,0.2002,0.1759,0.1323,0.1881,0.2575,0.1554,0.1275,0.1184,0.1184,0.0888,0.0749,0.1399,0.0851,0.1399,0.1914,0.2783,0.2988,0.3286,0.3249,0.3321,0.2541,0.3087,0.2
